document_data.name: Abordabe
document_data.mainbody: The '''Abordabe''' were a tribe of [[Nar (ethnicity)|Nar]] found in [[Narfell]].
document_data.Organization: Roughly 4,000 Nar comprised the Abordabe, making them the largest tribe found within Narfell.
document_data.Activities:
Perhaps because of their vast numbers, the Abordabe oversaw the [[Trade Fair]] on a yearly basis.

Contrary to many of the tribes scattered throughout Narfell, the Abordabe viewed outsiders as a potential source of wealth, making them more willing to trade instead of attack on sight.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Abordabe ranged mostly between [[Hark's Finger]] and the western banks of the [[Teardrops]].
